description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物、执业律师，民主党及其前身香港民主同盟的创党成员。曾长期担任香港立法会议员及油尖旺区议会议员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and practicing solicitor. He is a founding member of the Democratic Party and its predecessor, the United Democrats of Hong Kong. He was a long-serving member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong and the Yau Tsim Mong District Council.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申的前妻。
description.en: Former wife of James To Kun-sun.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申的妻子，公关公司高层。
description.en: Wife of James To Kun-sun, a public relations executive.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申和苏丽芬的儿子。
description.en: Son of James To Kun-sun and So Lai-fan.

description.zh-cn: 香港的第一个政党，于1994年与汇点合并组成民主党。
description.en: The first political party in Hong Kong, which merged with Meeting Point in 1994 to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派政党，由香港民主同盟和汇点于1994年合并而成。
description.en: A pro-democracy political party in Hong Kong, formed in 1994 by the merger of the United Democrats of Hong Kong and Meeting Point.

description.zh-cn: 香港一个已解散的论政团体，于1994年与香港民主同盟合并组成民主党。
description.en: A defunct political discussion group in Hong Kong, which merged with the United Democrats of Hong Kong in 1994 to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 香港十八个区议会之一，负责处理深水埗区的地区事务。
description.en: One of the 18 district councils of Hong Kong, responsible for advising on district affairs in Sham Shui Po.

description.zh-cn: 英属香港时期的立法机关，于1997年香港主权移交后被临时立法会取代。
description.en: The legislature of colonial Hong Kong, which was replaced by the Provisional Legislative Council after the handover of Hong Kong in 1997.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府
en: Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 于1997年至1998年运作的香港立法机关，由中央政府筹组以取代殖民时期的立法局。
description.en: The legislature of Hong Kong that operated from 1997 to 1998, established by the Central Government to replace the colonial-era Legislative Council.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区的立法机关。
description.en: The legislature of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港十八个区议会之一，负责处理油尖旺区的地区事务。
description.en: One of the 18 district councils of Hong Kong, responsible for advising on district affairs in Yau Tsim Mong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，泛民主派成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a member of the pro-democracy camp.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政策研究智库。
description.en: A policy research think tank in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 主张台湾成为一个独立主权国家的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement to pursue formal independence for Taiwan as a sovereign state.

en: Article 23 of the Hong Kong Basic Law

description.zh-cn: 《香港基本法》中关于国家安全的条文，要求香港特区自行立法禁止叛国等七种行为。
description.en: A provision in the Hong Kong Basic Law concerning national security, requiring the Hong Kong SAR to enact laws on its own to prohibit seven types of acts such as treason.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，泛民主派成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a member of the pro-democracy camp.

description.zh-cn: 香港的独立反贪污机构。
description.en: The independent anti-graft agency of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，民主建港联盟成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a member of the DAB.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主党成员。
description.en: A member of the Democratic Party in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，民主党成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a member of the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 关于2012年香港政治制度的改革方案，最终在立法会获得通过。
description.en: A reform package for the 2012 political system in Hong Kong, which was eventually passed by the Legislative Council.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府官员，曾任教育局局长。
description.en: A Hong Kong government official who served as the Secretary for Education.

description.zh-cn: 一种国家权力架构的政治学说，主张政府的行政、立法和司法职能应由不同且独立的部门执行。
description.en: A political doctrine of governmental power structure, which advocates that the executive, legislative, and judicial functions of government should be performed by different and independent branches.

nodes.id: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选

zh-cn: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选

description.zh-cn: 香港民主派为协调2020年立法会选举候选人而举行的非官方初选，后被政府指控违反国家安全法。
description.en: An unofficial primary election held by the Hong Kong pro-democracy camp to coordinate candidates for the 2020 Legislative Council election, which was later accused by the government of violating the National Security Law.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 由全国人民代表大会常务委员会于2020年6月30日通过的关于香港国家安全的法律。
description.en: A law concerning national security in Hong Kong, passed by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress on June 30, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，律师，民主党成员，曾任党主席。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and lawyer, a member of the Democratic Party and its former chairman.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主党成员。
description.en: A member of the Democratic Party in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主党成员。
description.en: A member of the Democratic Party in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 中华基督教会基华小学

zh-cn: 中华基督教会基华小学

description.zh-cn: 位于香港彩虹邨的小学。
description.en: A primary school located in Choi Hung Estate, Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港九龙的男子中学。
description.en: A secondary school for boys located in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，香港工会联合会成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a member of the Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，民主党成员。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and a member of the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: Hong Kong politician who served as the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申与袁彩莲于1992年结婚，2008年离婚。
description.en: James To and Yuen Choi-lin were married in 1992 and divorced in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申于2009年12月与苏丽芬再婚。
description.en: James To remarried So Lai-fan in December 2009.

relationships.target: 中华基督教会基华小学

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申是香港民主同盟的创党成员。
description.en: James To was a founding member of the United Democrats of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，香港民主同盟与汇点合并成民主党。
description.en: In 1994, the United Democrats of Hong Kong merged with Meeting Point to form the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，汇点与香港民主同盟合并成民主党。
description.en: In 1994, Meeting Point merged with the United Democrats of Hong Kong to form the Democratic Party.

position.zh-cn: 区议会议员（长沙湾选区）

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 1997年香港主权移交后，中央政府另组临时立法会，涂谨申与其他民主派立法局议员被迫离任。
description.en: After the handover of Hong Kong in 1997, the Central Government formed a Provisional Legislative Council, forcing James To and other pro-democracy Legislative Council members to step down.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年香港立法会选举中，涂谨申在区议会（第二）功能界别中以微弱优势击败了王国兴，成功连任。
description.en: In the 2016 Hong Kong Legislative Council election, James To narrowly defeated Wong Kwok-hing in the District Council (Second) functional constituency to secure his re-election.

description.zh-cn: 2003年8月，涂谨申与刘慧卿一同到台湾出席由群策会举办的「一国两制下的香港」研讨会。
description.en: In August 2003, James To and Emily Lau attended the 'Hong Kong under One Country, Two Systems' seminar in Taiwan, organized by the Taiwan Thinktank.

description.zh-cn: 在台湾出席研讨会后，涂谨申声明他支持中国统一，反对台独，与刘慧卿的立场划清界线。
description.en: After attending a seminar in Taiwan, James To stated that he supported the unification of China and opposed Taiwan independence, distancing himself from Emily Lau's position.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申在台湾的研讨会上发表论文，认为基本法第二十三条立法会戕害香港的人权与自由。
description.en: At a seminar in Taiwan, James To presented a paper arguing that the legislation of Article 23 of the Basic Law would undermine human rights and freedom in Hong Kong.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 2004年，涂谨申试图进入深圳向港澳办官员表达政改诉求时，被中方人员阻止并拒绝入境。
description.en: In 2004, when James To attempted to enter Shenzhen to convey demands for political reform to officials of the Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office, he was stopped by mainland personnel and denied entry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 2004年，何秀兰与涂谨申等人试图进入深圳向港澳办官员表达政改诉求时，被中方人员阻止并拒绝入境。
description.en: In 2004, when Cyd Ho, along with James To and others, attempted to enter Shenzhen to convey demands for political reform to officials of the Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office, she was stopped by mainland personnel and denied entry.

description.zh-cn: 陈云生曾就“汇标公司”事件向廉政公署报案，要求调查涂谨申。
description.en: Chan Wan-sang reported James To to the ICAC regarding the 'W汇标公司' incident, requesting an investigation.

description.zh-cn: 廉政公署在调查“汇标公司”事件后，确定事件为涂谨申的无心之失，未予起诉。
description.en: After investigating the 'W汇标公司' incident, the ICAC determined that it was an unintentional mistake by James To and did not press charges.

description.zh-cn: 在2007年区议会选举中，代表民建联的钟港武击败了替补涂谨申参选的民主党党员黎丽霞。
description.en: In the 2007 District Council election, Chung Kong-mo of the DAB defeated Democratic Party member Lai Lai-ha, who was the replacement candidate for James To.

description.zh-cn: 2007年区议会选举后，李永达批评涂谨申在选举中甚少支援九龙西候选人，称其为“懒将军”。
description.en: After the 2007 District Council election, Lee Wing-tat criticized James To for his lack of support for candidates in Kowloon West during the election, calling him a 'lazy general'.

description.zh-cn: 尽管最初反对，涂谨申最终在立法会跟随民主党的决定，对2010年政改方案投下支持票。
description.en: Despite his initial opposition, James To eventually followed the Democratic Party's decision and voted in favor of the 2010 political reform package in the Legislative Council.

description.zh-cn: 时任教育局局长杨润雄要求教科书删除“三权分立”的论述，引发争议。涂谨申批评其挑起矛盾、改写历史。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Education Kevin Yeung sparked controversy by demanding the removal of discussions on the 'separation of powers' from textbooks. James To criticized him for instigating conflict and rewriting history.

description.zh-cn: 在三权分立争议中，时任特首林郑月娥强调香港实行行政主导，并将争议归咎于宣传教育不足。
description.en: During the controversy over the separation of powers, then-Chief Executive Carrie Lam emphasized that Hong Kong operates under an executive-led system and attributed the dispute to insufficient publicity and education.

relationships.source: 2020年香港立法会选举民主派初选

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申因参与2020年的民主派初选，于2021年1月6日被指控涉嫌违反《香港国家安全法》而被捕。
description.en: Due to his participation in the 2020 pro-democracy primaries, James To was arrested on January 6, 2021, on suspicion of violating the Hong Kong National Security Law.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申因参与民主派初选，被指控涉嫌违反《香港国家安全法》而被捕。
description.en: James To was arrested on suspicion of violating the Hong Kong National Security Law for his participation in the pro-democracy primaries.

description.zh-cn: 2010年初，涂谨申带领民主党内的社区主任袁海文和刘俊业成立旺角太子工作团队。
description.en: In early 2010, James To led community officers within the Democratic Party, Ramon Yuen and Lau Chun-yip, to establish the Mong Kok and Prince Edward work team.

description.zh-cn: 2010年初，涂谨申带领民主党内的社区主任袁海文和刘俊业成立旺角太子工作团队。
description.en: In early 2010, James To led community officers within the Democratic Party, Ramon Yuen and Lau Chun-yip, to establish the Mong Kok and Prince Edward work team.

description.zh-cn: 涂谨申与杨润雄是中华基督教会基华小学时的同班同学。
description.en: James To and Kevin Yeung were classmates at CCC Kei Wa Primary School.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年立法会选举中，涂谨申为同属民主党的党友邝俊宇告急，协助其竞选。
description.en: In the 2016 Legislative Council election, James To made urgent appeals for his fellow Democratic Party member Kwong Chun-yu, assisting his campaign.

description.zh-cn: 时任民主党主席何俊仁担任了涂谨申2009年第二次婚礼的监礼人。
description.en: Then-Democratic Party Chairman Albert Ho served as the wedding solemnizer for James To's second marriage in 2009.
